English:
Nahhh ha ha haaaa! Another villain bites the dust!
Well done, well done!
Chinese:
哈哈哈！　看樣子又收拾了一個壞東西！
做得好做得好！
Korean:
핫핫핫! 이걸로 또 한명의 악당을 퇴치했구나!
잘했어 잘했어!
German:
Do-do-dooom, wieder ein Schurke weniger!
Gute Arbeit, gute Arbeit!

English: ...Hey. Why did you think Kayaba was the culprit?
Chinese: ……你為什麼會覺得茅場是犯人。
German:
... He. Wieso dachtest du eigentlich, dass
Kayaba dahintersteckt?

English: Did you get some information from anyone?
Chinese: 是從誰的身上得到了情報？

English: (Maybe I should tell them all about K...)
Chinese: （果然，應該跟龍司他們說關於K的事情……）
German: (Vielleicht sollte ich ihnen von K erzählen ...)

English: Hey, is that, like, a fight?
Korean: 어라, 저거 싸움 난 거 아냐……?

Chinese: 喂喂喂，看起來還是學生啊……
